org.springframework.social.evernote.api
Interface UserStoreOperations

All Superinterfaces:
StoreOperations
public interface UserStoreOperations
extends StoreOperations

Interface specifying a basic of UserStoreClient operations.

Author:
Tadaya Tsuyukubo
